content:
**Disclaimer** 

> We at Global eSports or any member of the Trust and Safety Team will never Direct Message (DM) you and ask for your **Seed Phrase** or send **links** to connect your wallet. If you receive such messages, please report the same via <#922912804422438932>. By joining the Gamers Guild Discord Server, you agree to have read and comply with the [ToS]() and [Community Guidelines]() laid down by discord in addition to the [Server Rules]() laid down by us. 

> It's advised that you turn off your DMs for this server to avoid unnecessary bots and links. If you clicked on a scam link (Discord Nitro / Free NFT / Connect  Wallet with App) please report the issue to the Trust and Safety team using <#922912804422438932> 

__**Official Links**__

Gamers Guild Discord Server -  https://dsc.gg/gamersguild
Global eSports Discord Server - https://discord.gg/globalesports 
Website - https://globalesports.com
GitHub Repo of Embeds in this Server - https://github.com/cyph3r-exe/Gamer-Guild-NFTs
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/c/GlobaleSportsin
Facebook -  https://facebook.com/GlobalEsportsIn
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/globalesportsin
Twitter - https://twitter.com/globalesportsin
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/globalesportsin

React below with :white_check_mark: to get started.
